text.en: Victorious buddhas and your heirs throughout the infinite worlds of the ten directions,
text.en-trans: rabjam chok chü gyalwa sé dangché

text.en: Together with all you sages, siddhas and vidyādharas of the past, present and future—
text.en-trans: dü sum drangsong drubpa rigdzin sok

text.en: All you powerful and compassionate ones, turn your attention towards me,
text.en-trans: tuden tukjé chen nam dak la gong

text.en: And grant your blessings so that these aspirations of mine may be fulfilled!
text.en-trans: mönlam yizhin drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: All my own and others’ virtuous deeds in saṃsāra and nirvāṇa,
text.en-trans: rangzhen khordé gewa malü dang

text.en: Together with my body, possessions and whatever is worthy of giving,
text.en-trans: lü dang longchö chö ö ngöpo nam

text.en: I offer in devotion, with respect and pure motivation,
text.en-trans: lama yidam pak tsok tamché la

text.en: To all you gurus,yidamdeities and the noble assembly!
text.en-trans: dé gü sampa dakpé chöpar gyi

text.en: Before you all, these vast offering clouds of Samantabhadra
text.en-trans: dedak chen ngar kunzang chöpé trin

text.en: Multiply beyond imagining and extend to the very limits of existence.
text.en-trans: samyé khakhyab sipé tar nepa

text.en: As you accept them by means of your wisdom, love and power,
text.en-trans: khyen tsé nü pé wang gi zhepé tü

text.en: May your immaculate intentions be entirely fulfilled!
text.en-trans: drimé gongpa tadak dzok gyur chik

text.en: May the Buddhist teachings and noble holders of the doctrine,
text.en-trans: tubpé ten dang tendzin dampa dang

text.en: As well as the oceanic hosts of guardians who protect the virtuous,
text.en-trans: karchok kyongwé sungma gyatsö tsok

text.en: All strengthen and flourish, extending to the limits of space itself,
text.en-trans: tutob chok ta khyabpar pelwa lé

text.en: And through this, may beings' virtue and goodness forever increase!
text.en-trans: kyegü gelek taktu gyé gyur chik

text.en: Through this excellent practice of dedication and its effects,
text.en-trans: detar ngöpé lek ché dré ché kyi

text.en: May the hopes of all beings everywhere be realised,
text.en-trans: khanyam drowé rewa dzok gyur té

text.en: So that they receive food, clothing, possessions, service, companions, sanctuary and more—
text.en-trans: zegö longchö dren drok né kyab sok

text.en: Whatever they wish for—by simply bringing it to mind!
text.en-trans: gang dö drenpa tsam gyi drub gyur chik

text.en: In particular, may those with whom I have a positive or negative connection,
text.en-trans: khyepar dak la pen dang nöjé pé

text.en: Those who act in ways that bring me benefit or harm,
text.en-trans: karnak lé kyi drelwé semchen dang

text.en: As well as all those who are exhausted by the torments of the lower realms,
text.en-trans: ngendrö né su nyamtak gyurpa nam

text.en: Swiftly come to find great bliss that is inexhaustible!
text.en-trans: zakmé dechen nyurdu tob gyur chik

text.en: In short, by dedicating all virtuous actions from the past, present or future,
text.en-trans: dorna dü sum gé tsok malü kün

text.en: In the manner of the victorious buddhas and their heirs,
text.en-trans: sé ché gyalwé jitar ngöpa zhin

text.en: Without conceptual reference and in keeping with illusion,
text.en-trans: mikmé gyumé tsul du yong ngowé

text.en: May all beings attain perfect awakening!
text.en-trans: dro kün dzokpé changchub tob gyur chik

text.en: For as long as I am yet to reach that final stage,
text.en-trans: chi si dé ma tob kyi sipar yang

text.en: May I gain a human or divine birth complete with seven qualities,1
text.en-trans: yönten dünden lhami lü tob né

text.en: And may I possess the wondrous riches of the noble,
text.en-trans: mejung pakpé nor la wangjor zhing

text.en: And rely on the infallible precious jewels as my refuge!
text.en-trans: lumé könchok kyab su ten gyur chik

text.en: May I follow and gratify an authentic spiritual teacher,
text.en-trans: tsenden shenyen tsulzhin nyé jé té

text.en: Observe the discipline and apply myself to study, reflection and meditation,
text.en-trans: tsul né tö sam gom la rab jor zhing

text.en: May I never be apart from bodhicitta, the spirit of awakening,
text.en-trans: changchub sem dang namyang mi dralwar

text.en: As I immerse myself in the oceanic conduct of the Buddha’s heirs!
text.en-trans: gyalsé chöpa gyatsor jukpar shok

text.en: May any stains on my conduct, misdeeds of body, speech or mind,
text.en-trans: detsé sotar changsem rigdzin gyi

text.en: Any failure to accord with the view, meditation and action
text.en-trans: ta gom chöpé tsul dang mitünpé

text.en: Of the vidyādharas, or the code of individual liberation or bodhisattva vows,
text.en-trans: go sum nyepar chöpé drima nam

text.en: Be eradicated entirely through applying the most excellent of remedies!
text.en-trans: puljung nyenpö tsené jom gyur chik

text.en: In all situations, may I entirely recall my past lives,
text.en-trans: nekab küntu tserab dren gyur né

text.en: And train with diligence in the utterly pure path.
text.en-trans: namdak lam la tsönpé lobpa dang

text.en: May I always uphold the infinite ways of the Dharma
text.en-trans: rabjam gyalwé chö tsul malüpa

text.en: Of the victorious buddhas and never allow them to decline.
text.en-trans: nyampa mepar taktu dzin gyur chik

text.en: May I always realise the points of the profound and vast,
text.en-trans: taktu drebü tekpa tadak gi

text.en: Which are conveyed in all the resultant vehicles,
text.en-trans: zab dang gyaché dön kün ngöngyur né

text.en: And fully traverse the paths and stages,
text.en-trans: sa dang lam gyi dröpa tarchin té

text.en: So that I perfect the qualities of abandonment and realization!
text.en-trans: pang tok yönten yongsu dzokpar shok

text.en: In this and all my future lives,
text.en-trans: kyewa di dang ma ong sipar dak

text.en: No matter where I might take birth,
text.en-trans: gang dang gangdu kyewa dé dang der

text.en: May I never deviate, even for a moment,
text.en-trans: chik tu zhen la penpé samjor dang

text.en: From my singular focus on altruistic thoughts and deeds.
text.en-trans: kechik tsam yang dralwar magyur chik

text.en: May all that the inhabitants of the three worlds find undesirable or unharmonious,
text.en-trans: si sum drowé mindö mitün kün

text.en: Both the causes and their effects, all ripen fully on me alone!
text.en-trans: gyu dang dré ché dak la rab min ching

text.en: And may all my own virtuous deeds of past, present and future
text.en-trans: dak gi dü sum gewa malüpa

text.en: Become causes for the benefit and happiness of incarnate beings!
text.en-trans: lüchen kün gyi pendé gyur gyur chik

text.en: When working directly or indirectly for the welfare of others,
text.en-trans: ngö sam gyü né zhendön drubpé tsé

text.en: May all outer, inner and secret obstacles, including evil spirits,
text.en-trans: dü dang dik drok nedön lasokpa

text.en: Corrupting companions, illness and harmful influences,
text.en-trans: chi nang sangwé barché tadak kyang

text.en: Become supports for awakening, like wind that fans the forest flames!
text.en-trans: nakme lung zhin changchub drok gyur chik

text.en: All at once, may I perfectly embrace
text.en-trans: chok chü dak dang ma dak zhing nam su

text.en: The ocean-like activity of the victorious ones and their heirs throughout the three times,
text.en-trans: sangye chö dang semchen minpa la

text.en: Such deeds as making offerings to buddhas and ripening sentient beings
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalsé gyatsö trinlé kün

text.en: In all the pure and impure realms throughout the ten directions.
text.en-trans: chik tu düpé pul gyi juk gyur chik

text.en: Having set out upon the great secret path that is unsurpassed,
text.en-trans: lamé sang chen lam gyi gor zhuk té

text.en: And realized the profound points of the path that swiftly matures and liberates,
text.en-trans: mindrol nyurlam zabmö né tok né

text.en: May I lead beings through vast, ocean-like skilful action
text.en-trans: tabkhé trinlé gyatsö drowa kün

text.en: And establish them all at the level of Vajradhara!
text.en-trans: dorjé dzinpé sa la göpar shok
